entry.title: $2598 // REAL King sz 2 Bedroom Stunner Prime Astoria - EIK - Elevator + Laundr
entry.content:
REAL King size 2 Bedroom Stunner in Prime Astoria - EIK - Elevator + Laundry

Listing ID #: 154939
Price: $2,598
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

This is an amazing REAL 2 Bedroom find in prime Astoria with a lot of space for all your belongings. The unit has a large living room, an Eat in kitchen and 2 large king size bedrooms with ample closet space and additional closet in the hallway. This gorgeous apartment has recently been renovated and is ready to move in. Heat and hot water are included in the stabilized rent of $2835. Location is super convenient near the Subway at 30h Ave which is only a 4-5 minute stroll away. This is an elevator and laundry building. Close proximity to many Bars, Restaurants and so much more. This is a place to call home! It won't last long!  Price advertised with one month free rent.

Contact me via call, text or email to schedule a viewing!

Olga Breise

Phone: (646)806-9998
Email: olga@bouklisgroup.com

The Bouklis Group
